JUDGES: Françoise Tulkens;Ireneu Cabral Barreto;Nona Tsotsoria;Vladimiro Zagrebelsky
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in Batman .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was taken into custody by police officers from the anti - terror branch of ORG on suspicion of membership of an illegal organisation . On DATE she was brought before the investigating judge at ORG , who ordered her detention on remand .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG declared a lack of jurisdiction and transferred the case file to ORG .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG at ORG filed an indictment with that court accusing her , inter alia , of membership of an illegal armed organisation and of involvement in activities that undermined the constitutional order of the ORG . The prosecution requested that the applicant be sentenced pursuant to LAW .
CARDINAL . The trial commenced before ORG . In the subsequent hearings , the court refused to release the applicant on account of the nature of the alleged offence and the state of evidence .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant submitted a petition to ORG , alleging that she had been ill - treated during police custody .

CARDINAL . The case against the applicant continued before ORG until DATE when , following a constitutional amendment , ORG were abolished . Thereafter , the applicant 's case was transferred to ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was released pending trial .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG declared its lack of jurisdiction and transferred the applicant 's case to ORG , holding that the applicant had been a minor at the time of the events .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date , ORG also declared its non - jurisdiction and the case file was then transferred to ORG .
CARDINAL . CARDINAL DATE the ORG declared a lack of jurisdiction and transmitted the case file to ORG to resolve the jurisdictional conflict .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG decided that the case should be heard by ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG acquitted the applicant of the charges against her .

CARDINAL . Subsequently , the applicant applied to ORG seeking compensation for both non - pecuniary and pecuniary damage pursuant to PERSON no . CARDINAL pertaining to the payment of compensation to persons unjustifiably arrested or detained . On DATE ORG awarded the applicant MONEY ( TRY ) in respect of pecuniary damage and TRY CARDINAL in respect of non - pecuniary damage . According to the information submitted by the applicant , the proceedings are still pending before ORG , following her appeal , and she has not yet received the due amount .
